lyrics_abstract:
Hey!
What?
Turn it off!
Dad, this is the the best part!
Turn it off!
No...
It's too late for this, turn it off!
Dad, this is the best part, come on!
No, turn it off now!
No, this is... I wanna listen to it, okay?
Yeah, right, too late! Sure... eat this!

Ow!
Ow!

I took my baby on a Saturday bang
Boy, i[...]
